vignette.name: Finding Objects in MSP
vignette.bodytext:
There are several ways to find an object that you might need when adding audio functionality to your patch. You can find a list of all MSP objects in functional groups using the MSP Objects by Function page . If you want to just see all the Max objects in alphabetical order, you might prefer the MSP Objects A-Z page.
The Max Object Thesaurus helps you find objects (in Max, MSP and Jitter) based on some key words and phrases. This is a great place to find objects based on what you wish to accomplish.
In addition, you can often find help on our website, in our user forum and in the MSP Tutorials.
